name: Alien Up Pre-Alpha Demo
description:
Concept demo. Kickstarter project happening 04/21!

In this fast-paced survival shooter, space mechanic Chelsea Crisp fights off hordes of alien enemies, with some help from her elite squad members! Play the pre-alpha demo and get ready for the Kickstarter campaign launching this spring!

Compatible with Windows operating systems

Use of a game controller is highly recommended.  Please leave feedback and contact us if you any issues playing the game. 

Press start and select at the same time to restart the game.

Visit our site BLACKSTREAKANIME.COM for more details on the game via the blog section.

Game by Justin Raimey

Progress videos and art found on my Twitter.

Twitter: @Stalemeat
